properties.displayName: Sensitive information types scanning should be enabled for storage accounts
properties.description:
Remediation steps
To enable information type scanning on storage accounts :
1. Go to the “Azure Information Protection” blade: https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_InformationProtection/DataClassGroupEditBlade/ipForAzureBlade
2. “Azure resources”->"Scanned resources ". 
3. Click "+Add"
 a. Select a subscription , 
 b. Optionally , change the scanning schedule 
 c. Select “Azure Blob storage” and container and click “Save”
